gendermobs.config.title: Gender Mobs Config
gendermobs.config.tooltip.colored_names: Color entity names based on gender (blue for male, pink for female)
gendermobs.config.tooltip.jade_icons: Show gender icons in Jade/WTHIT mod tooltips
gendermobs.config.tooltip.iconOffsetY:
Vertical position adjustment for Jade gender icons (-10 to 10, default: -3.5)
Negative values move up, positive values move down
gendermobs.config.tooltip.male_color: Hex color code for male entity names (e.g., #5555FF)
gendermobs.config.tooltip.female_color: Hex color code for female entity names (e.g., #FF55FF)
gendermobs.config.tooltip.preview: Click to choose from color presets
gendermobs.config.tooltip.use_default_na: Use built-in name database (over 5,000 English names)
gendermobs.config.tooltip.restore_defaul: Reset custom names to original mod defaults
gendermobs.config.tooltip.can_be_infecte: Define which entities can be infected and what zombie type they become
gendermobs.tooltip.infected_entity: Entity that can be infected (e.g., minecraft:villager)
gendermobs.tooltip.change_slider: Female spawn chance (0.0 = always male, 1.0 = always female)
gendermobs.tooltip.force_name: Force assign name to entity's CustomName tag
